Question: Write the correct word (can't, could, can't, couldn't). എനിക്ക് ഉറങ്ങാനേ പറ്റിയില്ല. I ___  sleep at all

Choose the correct word: (for, to , buy). I went to the shop __ some sugar
ഞാൻ എത്തിയപ്പോഴേക്കും അവർ പോയിരുന്നു. How do you say this in English?
Answers: They had left when I arrived
When I arrived, they had left

Change to Reported Speech) Ali:"I am tired"
Answer: Ali said that he was tired
